name: PIZA eatin SIM
description:
Note before reading: This is a PIZA SIM not a PIZZA SIM.

Hey and welcome to OBVIOUSLY the best game of this game jam.

The goal is simpel, eat as many piza’s as you can and try to prevent exploding by sleaping. This is a 1v1 deathmatch game so invite a friend to play it with.

The sin chosen was gluttony but when we went on making the game we saw that greed was a big part to.

First to 25 wins!!

PC is the ammount of piza’s you have eaten.

DC is the chance of you exploding in litle piza pieces.

Player 1 eats with Q and sleeps with A.

Player 2 eats with O and sleeps with L.

Press space to start.

Press Alt-F4 to exit.

We had a lot of fun making this litle game and hope you enjoy it. This is the first game made by: A Brick productions (that is why it is AMAZING).

Cheers,

A Brick Productions
